definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
to accelerate/to step on the gas
to open the throttle/to accelerate/to let her rip

sentences.english: He lifted his foot off the accelerator.
I twisted round and went to slam on the brakes, but in my confusion hit the accelerator a second time.
sentences.chinese: 我扭過身，猛地踩剎車，但是混亂中我又踩了油門。

sentences.english: Turn the throttle twist grip properly to continue preheating the engine for 1-3 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 適度扭動轉把式油門使發動機持續預熱1至3分鐘。

sentences.english: Using the air conditioner or defroster may reduce fuel economy.
sentences.chinese: 在發動機未關閉時空踩油門會降低燃油經濟性。

sentences.english: When I saw poisonous snake on the road I stepped on the gas at onc.
sentences.chinese: 當我看到路上有條毒蛇時，我馬上加大了油門。

sentences.english: Rook goosed the throttle, and the bike sent up a cloud of white smoke.
sentences.chinese: 露可加大了油門，摩托車噴出一陣白煙。

sentences.english: She pressed on the accelerator,roaring the engine.
sentences.chinese: 她踩下油門踏板，使引擎隆隆作響。

sentences.english: When the trigger is released, auto-start is turned off and throttle operates normally again.
sentences.chinese: 當鬆開扳機，自動啓動關閉，油門回覆正常工作狀態。

sentences.english: To get back up to speed, just hit the gas again.
sentences.chinese: 重新提速，您只需再一次踏下油門。

sentences.english: For many drivers, there is something fundamentally terrifying about a car that accelerates uncontrollably.
sentences.chinese: 對許多司機來說，油門失控是一件極其可怕的事情。

sentences.english: The pilot of the airplane gunned his engine for a sharp climb.
sentences.chinese: 飛機駕駛員爲使飛機急劇上升而加大發動機的油門。

sentences.english: There are times that you need to floor the gas pedal, especially if you’re moving out of a sharp curve.
sentences.chinese: 有時你需要把油門踩到底，特別是在拐出急彎時。

sentences.english: Revving the engine before turning it off may reduce fuel economy.
sentences.chinese: 在發動機未關閉時空踩油門會降低燃油經濟性。

sentences.english: Dan steps on the gas, leaving the scene, and Janet, behind.
sentences.chinese: 丹踩下油門，離開了現場，並沒能夠珍妮特。

sentences.english: I modulate the throttles as needed to make sure I'm not too fast.
sentences.chinese: 我把油門調整到適當的位置以便不會使自己飛的太快。

sentences.english: As I grappled with the belt, I reached for the brake and pumped the accelerator by mistake.
sentences.chinese: 我抓住了安全帶，一不小心踩了油門。

definition: to brake (when driving)/to stop/to switch off/to check (bad habits)/a brake
angular velocity/number of revolutions per minute
